meanings.definition: A picture or diagram that helps make something clear or attractive.
meanings.sent1: The book had an illustration of a cat to show what it looked like.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed looking at the illustrations in the magazine.
meanings.sent3: The illustration of a dancing banana made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an illustration of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The illustration of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like you were there.

meanings.definition: The action or fact of illustrating something.
meanings.sent1: His illustration of the process made it easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The illustration of his point with examples was very helpful.
meanings.sent3: The illustration of the teacher trying to juggle was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an illustration of strength in adversity.
meanings.sent5: The illustration of teamwork was so clear, it stayed in my mind for days.
